entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the son of Vernon and Petunia Dursley. He is mentioned as having his hands jerked upward to cover his mouth when he sees Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a wizard who has been attacked by Death Eaters. He is mentioned as laughing at Dudley's question and warning him about the dangers of being found by wizards.

entities.name: vernon dursley
entities.description: Vernon Dursley is Dudley's father. He is mentioned as blustering in response to Harry's warnings.

entities.name: petunia dursley
entities.description: Petunia Dursley is Dudley's mother. She is mentioned as looking at her husband Uncle Vernon.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a wizard who is mentioned as smashing something down a wooden front door in the distant past.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards who have attacked Harry. They are mentioned as being able to find and attack Dudley once he is seventeen.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are a group of dark creatures that feed on fear and despair. They are mentioned as being one of the dangers that Harry warns Dudley about.

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: Inferi are dead bodies enchanted by a Dark Wizard. They are mentioned as being one of the dangers that Harry warns Dudley about.

relationships.description: Harry is warning Dudley that Death Eaters will be able to find and attack him once he is seventeen.
Dudley will be attacked by Inferi once he is seventeen, according to Harry's warning.
Harry warns Dudley that Dementors are one of the dangers that will be able to find and attack him once he is seventeen.
Vernon Dursley has a conflict with Harry, as evidenced by his blustering response to Harry's warnings.
